name: Yuanbin Zhou Homepage
body: ### About I am a second year postgraduate student from [Hangzhou Dianzi University](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hangzhou_Dianzi_University), [China](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/China), major in computer engineering, advised by Pro. [Guojun Dai](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Guojun_Dai) and Dr. [Yifan Wu](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Yifan_Wu). My research interests include real-time system especially the limited preemptive scheduling algorithm and embedded system. I am expected to graduate in Apr. 2017 and now looking for a PhD position in the area of real-time system, embedded system, operating system and related filed in Europe or Asia. If you are recruiting PhD students, please do not hesitate to contact me. You can find my CV [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hduffddybz/hduffddybz.github.io/master/CV_Yuanbin.pdf). ### Contact E-mail:(ybzhou dot cn AT gmail dot com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
